page.title: 14RETAIL TRADE
page.content: 80% of the{shops}in our area are small,independent businesses,4% are chain stores (eg. Woolworths) and 2% are supermarkets. There are 4 whole sale cash and carry{warehouses}to serve these outlets. Goods sold include a wide variety of foods ranging from fresh, tinned, dried and processed to frozen. Other commodities offered for sale are toys, pets, clothes, shoes, sportswear and goods, petrol, medicines, books, flowers, garden accessories, computers, records, videos, cars and spares, Do- It-Yourself and camping equipment. There are two{second hand shops.}In 1985 13% of the available premises are vacant. An open{market}of 15 stalls is held each Friday and Saturday. Many people also shop in the neighbouring towns of Stourbridge, Wolverhampton, Dudley and Birmingham.
